title: Language-Agnostic Generation of Header Comments using Large Language Models
description: Artifact repository for the ICSME 2025 paper 'Language-Agnostic Generation of Header Comments using Large Language Models'. This repository contains the source code, survey application, documentation, and generated docstring evaluation data for the study described in the paper.
